title: Joshua’s Farewell Address
summary: In Joshua 23, an elderly Joshua gives his final address to Israel’s leaders. He reminds them of God’s faithfulness and urges them to remain loyal and separate from the nations around them, warning that disobedience will bring judgment.

faq.question: What is the main theme of Joshua’s speech?
faq.answer: Remain faithful to God and do not associate with or adopt the practices of surrounding nations.

faq.question: What warning does Joshua give?
faq.answer: If they turn from God and follow other gods, they will lose the land they’ve been given.
